channel.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
channel.description:
Okay, So I went through almost every single tutorial I could find, and I always come across some small error. Last time it was the port forwarding, because I don't have a router, I tried it but obviously couldnt without a router connected. I've tried a 508 setup and cant get it running. I have the No-Ip setup, with a host running, I'm using cheezscape as my base, so if somebody could walk me through it or talk to me on MSN and help me get through it I would really appreciate, I'm leaving my MSN for somebody really generous willing to donate some time. Also, as a little bonus I will pay you $10 via PayPal if you help me get setup, running so people can log in, and teach me the basic essentials. Easy Money :) Anyways, if your interested or willing hit me up on MSN the name is at the bottom, Thanks!
MSN: slayer51493@live.com
Thanks Much, :cool: C. Negatory :cool:

item.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
item.dc:creator: @CaptainNegatory CaptainNegatory
item.description:
@CaptainNegatory wrote:

The port is on the allowed list, it’s done nothing.

Read full topic
item.source: Struggling To Setup My First Server

item.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:2, topic:287678”]Try going to your firewall -> Exceptions
And add port 43594 there.
I don’t have a router either and the only thing i did was that and now people can connect.[/quote]

Nubz, read?

Read full topic
item.source: Struggling To Setup My First Server

item.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
item.dc:creator: @Nubz Nubz
item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

Your router may have a firewall in it. You can’t remove it as what I know, you can only allow certain games and ports in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

CaptainNegatory:

I think it’s the way I’m setting up the base client or whatever it’s called, I’m so lost. I thought I would just have to launch it but its not working, when I go to the website I get a blank white screen and my friend gets a screen that says Internet Explorer cannot display the webpage.

Well, duh, it IE, of course it will fuck up.

Read full topic

item.title: Struggling To Setup My First Server
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Try going to your firewall -> Exceptions
And add port 43594 there.
I don’t have a router either and the only thing i did was that and now people can connect.

Read full topic
